channel.title: Games on Not So Fungible
channel.description: Recent content in Games on Not So Fungible

item.title: Sloggit
item.description: I felt like building something less samey than another test website or to-do list app, so I’m working on a text-based adventure. As they say, the two hardest things in computer science are naming things and cache invalidation; consequently this little app labours under the uninspired name of “Sloggit”, until I can think of a better one. For the moment there are no caches involved, thankfully, but I am running into the less formally-hard problem of story writing.
